label: 想夫恋
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A gagaku piece.  The characters properly used to write its title mean something like “The Lotus in the Minister’s Garden,” but the Japanese preferred to use others (homophones) that suggest this romantic meaning.[雅楽][also 相府蓮、想夫憐][RK]
